text:
Quality Ownership Proposal for

Breathe Again

Submitted by

Executive Summary

Nira Balance by Breathe Again is a data-driven wellness platform that uses real-time health insights, smart device integration, and expert guidance to prevent and reverse lifestyle diseases. Backed by scientific evidence, it delivers personalized nutrition, fitness, and lifestyle plans, empowering users to achieve measurable health outcomes, improved energy, and long-term balance.

Moolya aims to be a strategic QA partner in this journey of Breathe Again by taking complete ownership of QA through a collaborative and structured approach to testing. We believe in a true partnership model, where Moolya integrates seamlessly with Breathe Again teams, contributing proactively at every stage rather than operating as an external vendor.

Problem Statement

• 1
• As the Nira Balance application experiences rapid growth and expansion, a structured and systematic QA approach is essential.
• 2
• Absence of a dedicated QA function - No formalized testing approach, practices, or processes in place.
• 3
• Existing system stability must be preserved; changes should not disrupt current functionality.
• 4
• Large feature set with high business value demands robust validation.
• 5
• Need for a collaborative partner who can integrate seamlessly with the internal team rather than operate as an external vendor.

Objective

The objective of this engagement is to partner with Breathe Again as an integrated extension of their team, implementing a structured QA strategy that enhances customer experience, ensures release quality, progressively introduces test automation, and expands to include performance and security validations. Moolya will take ownership of releases and collaboratively address customer challenges, working seamlessly as part of the Breathe Again team.

Key Focus Areas

Integrated Team Collaboration

Structured QA & Release Ownership

Test Automation

Customer-Centric Validation

Process Alignment & Coaching

Metrics Tracking & Continuous Improvement

Unified Expertise with Moolya9s 3-in-a-Box Model

Combination of Expertise: Integrated Under One Roof

By combining Delivery Engineering, Testing Experts, and Domain SMEs into one cohesive unit, Moolya offers a comprehensive, cost-efficient solution that drives faster delivery, higher quality, and scalable results

Delivery Engineering Team

Bringing Technical Excellence through Delivery Engineering

• Collaborative Development
• Custom Integrations
• Continuous Delivery Focus

Testing Experts

Expert QA Testing to Ensure Compliance and Quality

• Context Driven Testing
• Automated Testing Frameworks
• End-to-End Testing

Domain Subject Matter Expert (SME) Team

Domain Experts Ensuring Business and Project Alignment

• Deep Domain Knowledge
• Technical Guidance & Expertise
• Collaboration
heading_level_2: Combination of Expertise: Integrated Under One Roof

Phase

Activities

Deliverables

Discovery, Test Strategy and Initial Execution

Understanding of the Nira Balance Application, Workflows,

Tech Stack and Architecture Align on processes, tools, and communication protocols for smooth execution.

Collaborate with Breathe Again Stakeholders to understand the priority platform and features to begin the testing

Create a Test Strategy and Planning Document Write Test Cases for Core Features and structure them in the standardized test management tool

Start building the Sanity, Regression and Feature Test Suites Test execution of release builds

Report Bugs in the tracking tool Collaboration with the development team and key stakeholders

Generate Test Summary Report

Product Understanding document and mind maps

Test Strategy and Planning Document Test Cases

Test Summary Report

Month 2: Enhanced Functional Testing & QA scaling

Phase

Activities

Deliverables

QA Expansion & Maturity

Identify the new features and expand test coverage Prioritization of Test Cases Identify edge cases and error scenarios Structure the test cases as

Sanity/Regression/Feature test suite Test execution of release cycles Bug reporting and triaging Verification and Validation of Bugs Benchmark and measure the metrics Generate Test Summary Reports and

Documentation

A structured test case repository

Bug Report

Month 3 to Month n : Setup Ongoing Testing Process and Enable Test Automation

Phase

Activities

Deliverables

Enable Continuous Testing Process

Identify additional features/modules and expand test coverage as a continuous test activity.

Proceed with executing tests, reporting bugs, verification, and validation.

Ongoing test execution of sprint cycles Setup continuous process for release testing

Implement the testing process and best practices. Track Metrics

Create comprehensive test reports

An expanded Functional, Regression and Sanity Test Suite Weekly and Monthly Status Reports throughout the period, ensuring continuous communication and transparency

Test Summary Report offering insights into the testing efforts and outcomes.

Enable Test Automation

Assess the application and perform a feasibility study for test automation. Define a structured automation strategy and roadmap.

Scale the QA team to include dedicated automation expertise.

Test Automation Proposal Document

Deliverables

• Test Plan and Strategy Document
• Comprehensive Regression/Sanity/Smoke Test Suite in Bugasura
• Traceability Metrix
• Bug Report
• Test Automation Framework
• Automated Test Scripts-Sanity, Regression and Feature
• Weekly Test Summary Report with execution status and insights
• Comprehensive Test Summary Report
• Governance Report

Future Scope

Security Testing

Performance and Load Testing

Once the Nira Balance application achieves functional stability, Performance and Security Testing will be introduced. The scope and timeline for these activities will be determined following an assessment at that stage.

Success Criteria

• Seamless Integration with the Breathe Again Team 3 Moolya works as an extension of Breathe Again, collaborating closely with developers taking ownership and ensure smooth operations.
• Structured QA Processes 3 Adoption of standardized QA practices, with a centralized test case repository and supporting tools in place.
• Proactive Bug Prevention & Automation 3 Early defect detection with progressive automation to maintain stability.
• Metrics & Continuous Improvement 3 Track quality, monitor performance, and refine processes for ongoing improvement.

Assumptions

• Feature Walkthrough: The Breathe Again team will provide application walkthrough
• Point of Contact: A designated point of contact will be available for the Moolya team to reach out to for assistance.
• Requirement Stability : All functionalities will be clearly defined, and remain stable throughout the project timeline.
• Environment Availability : A dedicated and stable testing environment will be available for Moolya Team.
• Access to Test Data : Necessary test data will be provided by the Breathe Again team

Quality Metrics

Below are the primary metrics we measure in QA projects. As we progress in this project, evaluations will be conducted to track and assess the relevant metrics.

Metric

Impact

Test Coverage (Percentage of tests covered by automation)

Highlights how much of the application is tested and ensures better regression testing and reduces production defects.

Defect Density

Measures code quality by tracking defects per module or release

Defect Severity & Priority

Helps focus on issues with the highest business impact

Test Case Effectiveness

Shows how well test cases detect actual defects.

Test Execution Time

Helps identify test bottlenecks, allowing teams to optimize test suites

Defect Resolution Time

Shorter resolution time reduces risk of defect leakage to production

Automation Pass Percentage (Percentage of tests passing)

-

High pass percentage indicates system stability.

-

Low percentage may signal frequent failures, requiring deeper analysis.

Flaky Tests (Percentage of unstable or inconsistent tests)

-

High flakiness reduces trust in automation.

-

Leads to manual verification efforts and increased debugging time.

-

Stable tests improve efficiency and confidence in results.

Defect Detection Rate (Rate at which automated tests identify defects)

-

High rate ensures early defect identification, improving software quality.

-

Reduces debugging efforts in later stages of development.

Team Structure and Pricing

Engagement Model : Ongoing Ownership

Timeline

Team Structure

Cost in INR per month

Month 1

Manual-Functional Testing:

1 Test Manager

1 Senior Exploratory Tester

Month 3 to Month n

Manual-Functional Testing:

Test Automation:

1 Sr SDET

1 SDET

7,50,000

Payment Terms

• Payment to be done within 30 days of invoice generation
• Any applicable taxes will be charged extra on the pricing mentioned
• Invoice will be raised on the 25th of every month
• As part of our standard operating procedures, Moolya ensures comprehensive insurance coverage including liability, security, cybersecurity, and employee welfare. Should there arise a necessity for project-specific insurance, such coverage will be procured and billed accordingly as a pass-through expense.

Important Note: Preliminary Estimate and Scope Adaptability

This proposal has been prepared based on our current, understanding of the Breathe Again application and the outlined requirements. It serves as an initial estimate, providing a foundational overview of the proposed testing strategy, phases, and deliverables.

We acknowledge that the complexities of the application, along with specific testing needs, may evolve as we progress further into the project. Therefore, we anticipate refining this proposal to align more closely with the project's specific requirements and objectives, guided by our collaborative engagement with Breathe Again team.
